recipesJson.name: Guava Melon Bubblegum
recipesJson.author: EyeM2sRus
recipesJson.description: Super simple, super delicious. Inw bgyc at 1.4% keeps it in the mix but so it doesnt take over. 1% ss may be a lil high for some of you so please adjust to your preferences, but i felt here it bent things more candied which works. .75% is prolly good enough lol.

reviews.text: Looks bangin! I get where the 1% of SS gets into play... Might not be for everyone so please adjust to your own liking. Keep up the good work, mate!
